text: كَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Thus the word of your Lord has come into effect upon those who defiantly disobeyed - that they will not believe.
translation.id.indonesian: Demikianlah telah tetap hukuman Tuhanmu terhadap orang-orang yang fasik, karena sesungguhnya mereka tidak beriman.
